title: Saint Lucie Acupuncture & Integrative Medicine
description: We at Saint Lucie Acupuncture & Integrative Medicine, focus on our patients by relieving their symptoms as fast as possible, correcting the root cause of the imbalance and educating them with the purpose of ensuring a lifetime of health and happiness.
cleaned_text: SAINT LUCIE ACUPUNCTURE AND INTEGRATIVE MEDICINE Are you tired of feeling worn out, sick and in pain without being able to find a REAL solution? Are you looking for MORE natural and chemical-free ways of becoming and staying healthy? Then you are in the right place! Here at Saint Lucie Acupuncture we use the power of a 5000 year old ancient medicine combined with modern medicine to customize treatment plans that target your individual needs. We focus on relief, correction, prevention and education to ensure real health. Acupuncture will activate the body's power of healing itself by stimulating the circulation-vascular system, nervous system and endocrine system. We offer a great variety of ways to help you get the health that you deserve. We will design a treatment plan that will addressed your symptoms and the root cause of those symptoms. Hours We are happy to offer extended hours to our community, we are open Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday. The last appointment time available for Mondays and Fridays is 2:45 PM and on Tuesdays and Thursdays the last appointment time is 5:45 PM. Closed on Wednesdays and weekends. Call us or make your appointment online.
